provisions.title: Section 8
provisions.content:
8.41) For the purpose of making enquiries, inspections Rightof
or tests which the Commission consider necessary for
obtaining particulars and information under this Act any
person authorized in that behalf in writing by the Commis-
sion may enter any premises in which such person reason-
ably believes that electricity is used, or that electrical
apparatus is in use and may inspect any electrical appara-
tus therein and make tests.
       (2) A person entering any premises in pursuance of
this section shall produce to any person on the premises
reasonably requiring him to do so the written authority of
the Commission for him to so enter.
      (3) Any person on such premises shall to the best of
his knowledge and belief, answer all questions asked him
by a person authorized as aforesaid where the answers are
